title: Blur/dim background behind popups and modals to improve focus

requirements.text: Add a consistent blurred + dimmed backdrop effect whenever an overlay UI is open (e.g., modal dialogs like ProfileSetupModal and slide-over sheets), so the underlying page is visually de-emphasized and focus stays on the active popup.

quotes: fix this blur the background while poping up anything on the screen so that focus comes on that thing

acceptanceCriteria: When ProfileSetupModal is open, the entire app content behind it is visibly dimmed and blurred (not just darkened).
When the mobile navigation Sheet is open (hamburger menu), the entire app content behind it is visibly dimmed and blurred.
Backdrop styling is applied globally (via CSS overrides/theme), without editing files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).
Overlay blur/dim does not blur the modal/sheet content itselfâ€”only the background behind the overlay.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn/Radix UI sources are immutable).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Changing backend logic or adding new backend endpoints.
Redesigning modal layouts or adding new popup types beyond ensuring existing overlays have a blurred/dimmed backdrop.
